Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Break down the process step by step into seven main steps from SR verification to GLA approval identifying sequences parallels loop choice and partial orders

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Map process elements to POWL constructs using Transition for labeled activities OperatorPOWL with LOOP for BNC and DR and XOR for CD and MD and StrictPartialOrder for ordering and concurrency

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Propose initial hierarchical structure with phases like sequential SR CS parallel DA ACI loop config deployment choice and final checks with partial orders

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Reevaluate structure to use flatter single root StrictPartialOrder containing all nodes and direct edges instead of nested phases for clearer dependency modeling

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Verify the flat model against scenario requirements confirming SR precedes CS CS precedes DA and ACI DA and ACI precede loop loop precedes choice choice precedes QA and SA QA and SA precede GLA

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Infer that no silent transitions are needed as LOOP and XOR operators inherently handle exit conditions and choices without additional silent nodes

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Double check POWL semantics including partial order edges meaning source completion before target start and confirm overall model accuracy
